dialog.text: Hi. The seeker  did greeting. The supporter should also do greetings.
Oh, hi. How are you doing?
I'm doing ok, just a bit sad. The seeker  feels sad. The supporter should ask the seeker the reason for feeling sad.
I feel bad to hear that, could you please share more details?

Yeah, it's about my friend. She wanted to hang out with me and I refused her because of the pandemic. And she felt that I was selfish and didn't want to spend time with her. It's really bothering me. The seeker  feels sad because the seeker's friend might feel hurt because of the seeker's decision. The supporter could tell the seeker that the supporter is willing to listen to the seeker's story.
I understand how you are feeling about that, I would be upset as well.
beam_texts: I understand how you are feeling about that, I would be upset as well.

dialog.text: I don't understand why she thinks I'm being selfish. I'm not going to hang out with her but I'm also not going to hurt my friendship with her just to be safe. The seeker  feels sad because the seeker's friend is mad at the seeker. The supporter could tell the seeker that the decision is made to protect both of them. The supporter could also suggest the seeker to talk to the friend and apologize.
I think she is being selfish herself by not accepting your decision and by putting you in a bad light.
beam_texts: I think she is being selfish herself by not accepting your decision and by putting you in a bad light.

dialog.text: I agree. I think she's trying to make me feel guilty for not wanting to hang out with her in a bad light. The seeker  feels sad because of the friendship issue. The supporter could tell the seeker that the supporter is willing to help the seeker to work on the problem.
I think it might be time to make a choice as to if she is a true friend or not.
beam_texts: I think it might be time to make a choice as to if she is a true friend or not.

dialog.text: I think so too. I'm not going to hang out with her just to be nice. I have my own friends that I can hang out with. The seeker  feels sad because of the friend. The supporter could tell the seeker to spend time with other friends and have fun.
I think that is a great idea.
beam_texts: I think that is a great idea.

dialog.text: Thanks! I feel a lot better about this. The seeker  feels sad about the friend. The supporter could tell the seeker to spend more time with other friends. The supporter could also tell the seeker that the friend is being selfish.
You are very welcome. I am glad you feel better. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
beam_texts: You are very welcome. I am glad you feel better. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

dialog.text: No, you've been very helpful. Have a great day! The seeker  feels sad because of the friend. The supporter could tell the seeker to talk to the friend and explain the reasons. The supporter could also suggest the seeker to find some other friends to spend time.
You as well!
Thanks! The seeker  feels sad because of the friend's behavior. The supporter could affirm the seeker's decision and tell the seeker that the friend is not being a true friend.
You're welcome!
